column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////There was a trend with all the food - it seemed like it was cooked beforehand
column2: and sitting there waiting for somebody to order it. It didn't taste freshly made
column3: and the hot food wasn't as hot as it should be (nor was the cold food cold enough)! When the food tasted good
column4: it almost seemed like an accident
column5: like it was good in spite of the preparation! The cheeses were very mild and were served with a nice preserve and some nuts
column6: but they had condensation on them when they came out - implying that they'd been sitting out - this was the Spanish Artisan Cheese Plate.
